```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- readxl::read_xlsx("~/R/data-for-testing-copy (1).xlsx")
```

```{r}
df %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = 4:20) %>%
  select(c(1,4,5)) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = name,
              values_from = value) %>%
  write_csv("test.csv")
```
